name: test_e2e_with_logs[403_XPATH_AND_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XPATH_AND_001` |
| **Name** | XPath AND-based injection with count function |
| **Category** | XPATH |
| **Subcategory** | function_abuse |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' and count(//*) > 0`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20and%20count%28%2F%2F*%29%3E0`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes
